species.name: hakamo-o
descriptions: Before attacking its enemies, it clashes its scales together and roars. Its sharp claws shred the opposition.
It leaps at its prey with a courageous shout. Its scaly punches tear its opponents to shreds.
It makes noise by clanging its scales together. When the rhythm has reached its peak, Hakamo-o attacks.
It sheds and regrows its scales on a continuous basis. The scales become harder and sharper each time theyâ€™re regrown.
The scaleless, scarred parts of its body are signs of its strength. It shows them off to defeated opponents.

abilities.name: bulletproof
abilities.effect: Protects against bullet, ball, and bomb-based moves.
